snippet.title: The Train Part 2 - A New Adventure for the Nintendo Game Boy!
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE TO PURCHASE:
Physical: https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/1840663223/the-train-part-2-physical-boxed-copy

Digital: https://gnomekinggames.itch.io/the-train-part-2

-----------------------

The Greyhound makes its second grand trip!

Word has spread around the island that The Greyhound is back in service, and a new set of tracks has been laid to the sprawling metropolis of New Bromdal! 

Join Eve and her grandad as they set off on a new adventure to the big city!Leave romanticised village life behind and travel to a world of skyscrapers, traffic jams, and (of course) urban silliness!

New friends await them, and with new friends come new challenges, but Eve is always happy to lend a hand whenever she can. What could possibly go wrong in such a perfect city?

Will Eve find the confusing world of tarmac and steel inviting? How will her grandad react to such a change of environment? These are important questions that only they will find the answers for.

Website: https://www.gnomekinggames.co.uk/
